channel.title: Stewpot: Tales from a Fantasy Tavern (One-shot, January)
channel.description:
This session is scheduled for 3 hours on [date=2020-01-22 time=18:30:00 timezone="America/New_York"]. The session won't be recorded.
[Stewpot](https://noroadhome.itch.io/stewpot-tales-from-a-fantasy-tavern) is a GM-less game about retired adventurers who settle down together to start a tavern. As we put our adventuring lives in the past, learn new skills, and improve our tavern, we'll create memories together that will last a lifetime.
We'll use Stewpot's built in safety tools: 5-minute breaks every three minigames, plus Holds, which are similar to the X-card. Also, participants must abide by the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct.
RSVP here: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LxqRuBWYynrbUflE-iW

item.title: Stewpot: Tales from a Fantasy Tavern (One-shot, January)
item.dc:creator: @horrorcheck
item.description:
@horrorcheck wrote:

There’s an opening for this game tonight! (It doesn’t look like it bc the person hasn’t un-RSVPed but there is!) The first person in the waitlist will also be able to play.

Read full topic
item.source: Stewpot: Tales from a Fantasy Tavern (One-shot, January)
